mapper.select:
select
FROM tbl_department_exam left join tbl_shengtai_exam ON tbl_department_exam.exam_id = tbl_shengtai_exam.exam_id WHERE tbl_shengtai_exam.exam_status = '考核中' AND tbl_department_exam.department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tbl_shengtai_exam.valid = "1"

select
from tbl_shengtai_exam where
valid = "1" and
exam_type like "%"#{examType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and
exam_name like "%"#{examName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and
exam_desc like "%"#{examDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and
exam_status like "%"#{examStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and
create_uid like "%"#{createUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and
start_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and end_time <= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.update: update tbl_shengtai_exam t1 inner join ( select id from tbl_shengtai_exam where tbl_shengtai_exam.parent_exam_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tbl_shengtai_exam.valid="1" ) t2 on t1.parent_exam_id = t2.id set t1.exam_status = #{examStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP};
